column5: My place is close the DFW and Love airports, restaurants, & Baylor Scott & White Medical Center. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers. Large Kitchen, shared clean bathroom, lock on bedroom door, clean towels & linens, and a large king bed. Upon a reservation confirmation, you will get a door code so you can arrive at any time and come/go as you please. Cable television with over 150 HD channels is in the room.
column8: Master King Irving DFW w/ Cable TV & Door Code
